Mrs. CAPITO. Mr. President, I rise to discuss my support for H.J.  Res. 61, a joint resolution of disapproval under the Congressional  Review Act to repeal the Environmental Protection…
The PRESIDING OFFICER (Mrs. Capito). The Senator from California.
